analysis.key_quote: A civil servant, working in the Trump administration under the purview of the Proposed Rule, could be fired if he/she was basing decisions on objectivity rather than the anti- DEI dogma of the administration.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about reverting to a corrupt system and emphasizes the importance of a merit-based civil service, which aligns with the themes of politicization and due process.
